General.Name: Gansu Qilianshan Cement Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Gansu Qilianshan Cement Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells cement and commercial concrete in China. The company also offers cement clinker and other related products. Gansu Qilianshan Cement Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Lanzhou, China.
